item.title: Building This Website
item.description: An experiment in web dev: hugo + vercel I coded up my own site - here’s how and why. I wanted a newsletter dedicated to my projects so I could keep my professional network updated on my latest activities. Given this, I could only see it happening if my newsletter was something I could own. I’ve used Wordpress and Weebly for a long time, but have gradually witnessed more and more features put behind a paywall.
